default_text: Documents enable you to make sure only qualified candidates can do specified Categories. To see what requirements a Document has, click on it. To add a new document, tap the button above.
default_candidates_text: Click on a candidate to see a list of their uploaded documents along with their statuses.
default_inspect_title: This is a feed of all the uploaded documents
default_inspect_text: Click on one to inspect the uploaded file and approve or reject the submitted document.
